caseName: Hodes & Nauser, MDS, P.A. v. Schmidt
caseNameFull: HODES & NAUSER, MDS, P.A.; Herbert C. Hodes, M.D.; And Traci Lynn Nauser, M.D., Appellees, v. Derek SCHMIDT, in His Official Capacity as Attorney General of the State of Kansas; And Stephen M. Howe, in His Official Capacity as District Attorney for Johnson County, Appellants.

opinions.snippet:
Stegall, J., dissenting:
This case is not only about abortion policy -the most divisive social issue of our day-it is more elementally about the structure of our republican form of government. Which is to say, this case is about the proper conditions for just rule. At bottom, this case is about finding and drawing the sometimes elusive line between law and arbitrary exercises of power. Here we venture onto a bat
